p: Replication in vitro of kobuviruses has been demonstrated only for AiV strain A846/88 [ 68] and bovine kobuvirus strain U-1 [ 91], determining both a distinct cytopathic effect on BS-C-1 and Vero cells, respectively. By converse, in spite of several attempts on different cell lines, replication of FeKoV in cell cultures has never been successful [ 86].
